original_text: The name of Saul's wife was Ahinoam. She was the daughter of Ahimaaz. Abner was the leader of Saul's army. He was the son of Saul's uncle, Ner.
korean_text: 사울의 아내의 이름은 아히노암이니 아히마아스의 딸이요 그의 군사령관의 이름은 아브넬이니 사울의 숙부 넬의 아들이며

sentences.original_text: The name of Saul's wife was Ahinoam.
She was the daughter of Ahimaaz.
Abner was the leader of Saul's army.
He was the son of Saul's uncle, Ner.
